description:
Luffy kicks his attack mode into second gear to save a precious statue, and the snake sisters start to feel the Straw Hat heat. At the battle’s climax, Luffy makes an impression on his opponents.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !معركة قوى خاصّة شاملة! فاكهة المطّاط ضدّ فاكهة الأفعى!
All-Out Special Power Battle!! Gum-Gum vs. Snake-Snake
Les pouvoirs à plein pot ! Gum-gum contre Gorgone
Nouryoku Zenkai Battle!! Gomugomu Tai Hebihebi
Битва на полную мощь! Гому-Гому против Хэби-Хэби
能力全開バトル!! ゴムゴムVSヘビヘビ
